content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring coal from the chest to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting placement. Check for collisions with existing entities or unsuitable terrain (e.g., water). Adjust the spacing, direction, or reference position to avoid placement errors.

### Errors Due to Lack of Resources
- Before attempting to insert items into a structure, verify that the required items are available in your inventory to avoid insertion errors.
